name: Hi, I'm Daniel Blanco
body:
### About
Daniel preciously worked as head of e-commerce, analytics & optimization at The Cocktail and was Chief Digital Officer at IPglobal (a conversion & performance focused startup).

Having +7 years of experience creating and executing digital products and services to top-tier companies in Spain he is an expert on data analysis and results optimization.

His Jekyll side loves music, pop culture and expends most of his time searching and digging up rare (but incredible) songs from ancient vinyl records.

### Where
* tw: @enblanco
* ln: https://www.linkedin.com/in/enblanco
* ig: http://instagram.com/enblanco

### Contact
Anything to share? [try here](enblanco@gmail.com)
